citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
At time of inspection there was a significant number of both live and dead insects on feed bags stored in a back room of
building #2. The building housed 38 cats and 5 kittens. Insect infestation can cause health and well-being issues to the
animals housed and contaminate feed sources. The licensee shall implement appropriate pest control methods so as to
minimize the insect population.
To be correct by August 30th, 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.11(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
At time of inspection there was a significant number of both live and dead insects on feed bags stored in a back room of 
building #2. The building housed 38 cats and 5 kittens. Insect infestation can cause health and well-being issues to the 
animals housed and contaminate feed sources. The licensee shall implement appropriate pest control methods so as to 
minimize the insect population. 
 
To be correct by August 30th, 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
